member.name: T:WampSharp.Fleck.FleckWebSocketTransport
member.summary: Represents a WebSocket transport implemented with Fleck.

member.name: M:WampSharp.Fleck.FleckWebSocketTransport.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of given the server address to run at.
member.param: The certificate to use for secured websockets.

member.name: M:WampSharp.Fleck.FleckWebSocketTransport.#ctor(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2,System.Func{System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols})
member.summary: Creates a new instance of given the server address to run at.
member.param: The certificate to use for secured websockets.
If non-null, used to set Fleck's EnabledSslProtocols.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of given the server address to run at.
member.param: The certificate to use for secured websockets.
